Package com.vagsoft.bookstore.mappers

Interface BookMapper

public interface BookMapper
Mapper class for converting Book entities and DTOs

    • linkGenres

      default void linkGenres(BookWriteDTO dto, Book book)
      Links the books inside the genres of a Book entity with itself, after mapping
      Parameters:
      dto - the BookWriteDTO that was used in the mapping
      book - the Book entity that contains the genres

    • linkGenreIDs

      default void linkGenreIDs(BookUpdateDTO genreDto, Book book)
      Links the genre ids of the Book to the non-null genre ids of the BookUpdateDTO, to be able to update the genres and avoid deletion
      Parameters:
      genreDto - the BookUpdateDTO that was used in the mapping
      book - the Book entity that contains the genres

    • linkGenreBooks

      book - the Book entity that contains the genres
